trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
You can retrieve an instance of this class through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 통해이 클래스의 인스턴스를 검색할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 통해 컨트롤에 대 한 참조를 유지 관리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 이러한 종류의 사용을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that created this collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection" /> class for the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
Adds the given column to the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to add.
Adds the given column to the collection.
The index of the column.
The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는이 방법의 사용을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-
<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-

The <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />.

Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
-or-

The <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
-or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
-or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> property value that would cause the combined <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> values of all columns in the control to exceed 65535.
-or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
-or-

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row and <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" />.
The name by which the column will be referred.
The text for the column's header.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn" /> with the given column name and column header text to the collection.
The index of the column.

The `columnName` and `headerText` parameters are related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `columnName` 및 `headerText` 관련 된 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.HeaderText%2A> 속성을 각각.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />, which conflicts with the default column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" />.
-or-

The default column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> property value of 100 would cause the combined <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> values of all columns in the control to exceed 65535.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> objects to add.
Adds a range of columns to the collection.
The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는이 방법의 사용을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Set the Sizing Modes of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는에서 사용할 수 있는 보다 큰 예제의 일부 [하는 방법: Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정 모드 설정](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-
At least one of the values in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-

At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row.
-or-

At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />.

Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
-or-

At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
-or-

At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
-or-

The columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> have <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> property values that would cause the combined <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> values of all columns in the control to exceed 65535.
-or-
At least two of the values in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> are references to the same <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />.
-or-

At least one of the columns in <paramref name="dataGridViewColumns" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
Clears the collection.
The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는이 방법의 사용을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는에서 사용할 수 있는 보다 큰 예제의 일부 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 열 채우기 모드](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
Occurs when the collection changes.
Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 변경의 예로 추가 또는 제거가 열이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는이 멤버를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 이벤트 처리기에서 보고 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 이 보고서를 통해 이벤트 발생 하 고 디버깅 하는 데 도움이 수 때 배울 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 자주 발생 하는 이벤트 또는 여러 이벤트를 보고 하려면 바꾸는 것이 좋습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 와 <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 여러 줄에 메시지를 추가 하거나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: 예제 코드를 실행 하려면 형식의 인스턴스를 포함 하는 프로젝트에 붙여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 라는 `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 이벤트 처리기가 연결을 확인는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given column is in the collection.
The name of the column to look for.
Determines whether the collection contains the column referred to by the given name.
<see langword="true" /> if the column is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The name of a column is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 열 이름으로 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to look for.
Determines whether the collection contains the given column.
<see langword="true" /> if the given column is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The destination <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> array.
The index of the destination array at which to start copying.
Copies the items from the collection to the given array.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> upon which the collection performs column-related operations.
<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter for inclusion.
Returns the number of columns that meet the given filter requirements.
The number of columns that meet the filter requirements.
The following code example illustrates how to use this method to get the number of selected columns.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 선택 된 열 번호를 가져오려면이 메서드를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter for inclusion.
Returns the width, in pixels, required to display all of the columns that meet the given filter requirements.
The width, in pixels, that is necessary to display all of the columns that meet the filter requirements.
The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는이 방법의 사용을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는에서 사용할 수 있는 보다 큰 예제의 일부 [하는 방법: Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤에서 행 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
Returns the first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represents the filter for inclusion.
Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.
The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or <see langword="null" /> if no column is found.

The first column in display order is the column with the lowest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 표시 순서에서 첫 번째 열은 가장 낮은 열 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 는 열이 실제로 화면에 표시 되는지 여부에 관계 없이 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 인덱스 값을 직접 비교할 필요 없이 지정된 된 조건에 맞는 첫 번째 열을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetFirstColumn%2A> method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetFirstColumn%2A> 메서드를 표시 된 첫 번째 열과 마지막 표시 된 열입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.
Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter and exclusion-filter requirements.
The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or <see langword="null" /> if no column is found.

The first column in display order is the column with the lowest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 표시 순서에서 첫 번째 열은 가장 낮은 열 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 는 열이 실제로 화면에 표시 되는지 여부에 관계 없이 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 인덱스 값을 직접 비교할 필요 없이 지정된 된 조건에 맞는 첫 번째 열을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.
Returns the last column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.
The last displayed column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or <see langword="null" /> if no column is found.

The last column in display order is the column with the highest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 표시 순서에서 마지막 열은 가장 높은 인 열 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 는 열이 실제로 화면에 표시 되는지 여부에 관계 없이 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you determine the last column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 인덱스 값을 직접 비교할 필요 없이 지정된 된 조건에 맞는 마지막 열을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetLastColumn%2A> method to swap the last displayed column and the first displayed column.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetLastColumn%2A> 메서드를 마지막 표시 된 열과 첫 번째 표시 된 열입니다.

trans-unit.source: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
The column from which to start searching for the next column.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.
Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.
The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or <see langword="null" /> if no column is found.

The next column in display order is the column with the lowest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value higher than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 표시 순서에서 다음 열은 가장 낮은 열 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 보다 큰 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 는 열이 실제로 화면에 표시 되는지 여부에 관계 없이 지정 된 열의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you determine the next column after the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 인덱스 값을 직접 비교할 필요 없이 지정된 된 조건에 맞는 현재 열 뒤에 다음 열을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumnStart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
The column from which to start searching for the previous column.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.
Gets the last column prior to the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.
The previous column that meets the given filter requirements, or <see langword="null" /> if no column is found.

The previous column in display order is the column with the highest <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value lower than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 이전 열 표시 순서에서 가장 높은 인 열을이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 보다 낮은 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> 는 열이 실제로 화면에 표시 되는지 여부에 관계 없이 지정 된 열의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you determine the first column before the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 인덱스 값을 직접 비교할 필요 없이 지정된 된 조건에 맞는 현재 열 하기 전에 첫 번째 열을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumnStart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to return the index of.
Gets the index of the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> in the collection.
The index of the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />.
The zero-based index at which to insert the given column.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to insert.
Inserts a column at the given index in the collection.
The following code example illustrates the use of this method.

trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 데이터 바인딩된 Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤에 바인딩되지 않은 열 추가](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/unbound-column-to-a-data-bound-datagridview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-
<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-

The <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />.

Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
-or-

The <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
-or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
-or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
-or-

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row and <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets a column in the collection.
The zero-based index of the column to get or set.
Gets or sets the column at the given index in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> at the given index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> 지정된 된 인덱스에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the collection minus one.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 컬렉션의 요소를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> unless overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 반환 <see langword="null" /> 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생하면 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 메서드를 사용하면 파생 클래스가 대리자를 연결하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이는 파생 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" />를 재정의하는 경우 등록된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 기본 클래스의 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 메서드를 호출해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes a column from the collection.
The name of the column to delete.
Removes the column with the specified name from the collection.
The name of a column is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 열 이름으로 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: To remove a column that is automatically generated when binding to a data source, call this method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스에 바인딩할 때 자동으로 생성 되는 열을 제거 하려면이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete?displayProperty=nameWithType> 이벤트 처리기입니다.

The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />.

Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.

-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-
The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value of the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />.

Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
-or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> property value that would cause the combined <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> values of all columns in the control to exceed 65535.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
-or-

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row and the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />.
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
-or-
The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property value of the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />.

Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
-or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> property value that would cause the combined <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight" /> values of all columns in the control to exceed 65535.
-or-

The column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
-or-

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row and the column indicated by <paramref name="value" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 모든 경우에 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 모든 경우에 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column to get.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not support setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은이 속성을 설정 하는 것을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is being set.
When getting this property, <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the collection minus one.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the collection.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified object from the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />.
<paramref name="value" /> is not in the collection.
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
The location of the element to delete.
Removes the element with the specified index from the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the control minus one.
The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
Selecting all cells in the control.
Clearing the selection.
Updating column <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> property values.
-or-
This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
